title: 461. How to Stop Worrying and Love the Robot Apocalypse
description: It’s true that robots (and other smart technologies) will kill many jobs. It may also be true that newer collaborative robots (“cobots”) will totally reinvigorate how work gets done. That, at least, is what the economists are telling us. Should we believe them?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
